name: Little Big Planet 2: Collectors Edition
summary:
Special Collectors Edition version of LBP2 that comes with the game, Sack Boy Plushie, Book ends with cardboard popups of Sack Boy, and Davinci, plus all DLC that was released as exclusives by different retailers and a few others unique to this collection set. 
 
Here is the link for this game set on PriceCharting: 
 
https://www.pricecharting.com/game/playstation-3/littlebigplanet-2-collector's-edition
